text: Jerome "Jerry" Siegel (October 17, 1914 - January 28, 1996)Roger Stern. Superman: Sunday Classics: 1939 - 1943 DC Comics/Kitchen Sink Press, Inc./Sterling Publishing; 2006 was an American comic book writer and artist. He is known for creating Superman. He won many awards and was honored many times for his creation. Siegel was born on October 17, 1914 in Cleveland, Ohio to a Jewish family. Siegel studied at Greenville High School. Siegel was married to Joanne Siegel from 1948 until his death in 1996. They had one daughter, Laura. Siegel died from unknown causes in Los Angeles, California, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== *Mike's Amazing World of DC Comics: The DC Database - Jerry Siegel *Jerry Siegel Attacks!
